Welcome to Character Creation!\n Start by entering some basic information about your character then press Continue. All these values can be changed later if you change your mind. Note: type is normally Player Character unless you are making a side character
Languages\n You may add up to 10 Languages. Note: Currently Not Added
Levels\n Open Legend levels can be expressed as Major and Minor Levels or simply Experience. Unless Specified by the GameMaster most Players start at Major(0)/Minor(0) or Experience(0).

Attributes, Banes, and Boon\n Attribute points determine what your character is good at. To increase an attribute the value of the next attribute value must be spent (2->3 requires 3 points). Stats like Guard are calculated based on your attributes. Additionally attributes unlock different Banes/Boons which can turn the tide of battle. Note: Information on calculations on the Open Legend - Character Creation website
